aroma-veil.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
aroma-veil.effect_description: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.
aroma-veil.short_effect_description: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.

flower-veil.name: flower-veil
flower-veil.description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon’s stats.
flower-veil.effect_description: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.
flower-veil.short_effect_description: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

cheek-pouch.name: cheek-pouch
cheek-pouch.description: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.
cheek-pouch.effect_description: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.
cheek-pouch.short_effect_description: Restores HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

protean.name: protean
protean.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s using.
protean.effect_description: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.  The type change takes place just before the move is used.
protean.short_effect_description: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

magician.name: magician
magician.description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
magician.effect_description: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
magician.short_effect_description: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.

bulletproof.name: bulletproof
bulletproof.description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
bulletproof.effect_description: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
bulletproof.short_effect_description: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.

competitive.name: competitive
competitive.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.
competitive.effect_description: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
competitive.short_effect_description: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

strong-jaw.name: strong-jaw
strong-jaw.description: The Pokémon’s strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.
strong-jaw.effect_description: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
strong-jaw.short_effect_description: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

refrigerate.name: refrigerate
refrigerate.effect_description: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
refrigerate.short_effect_description: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

sweet-veil.name: sweet-veil
sweet-veil.description: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

stance-change.name: stance-change
stance-change.description: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.
stance-change.effect_description: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.
stance-change.short_effect_description: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.

gale-wings.name: gale-wings
gale-wings.effect_description: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.
gale-wings.short_effect_description: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.

mega-launcher.name: mega-launcher
mega-launcher.description: Powers up aura and pulse moves.
mega-launcher.effect_description: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.
mega-launcher.short_effect_description: Strengthens aura and pulse moves to 1.5× their power.

grass-pelt.name: grass-pelt
grass-pelt.description: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.
grass-pelt.effect_description: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.
grass-pelt.short_effect_description: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.

symbiosis.name: symbiosis
symbiosis.description: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.
symbiosis.effect_description: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
symbiosis.short_effect_description: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

tough-claws.name: tough-claws
tough-claws.description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.
tough-claws.effect_description: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.
tough-claws.short_effect_description: Strengthens moves that make contact to 1.33× their power.

pixilate.name: pixilate
pixilate.effect_description: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into fairy moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
pixilate.short_effect_description: Turns the bearer's normal moves into fairy moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

gooey.name: gooey
gooey.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
gooey.effect_description: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
gooey.short_effect_description: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

aerilate.name: aerilate
aerilate.effect_description: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into flying-type moves.  Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
aerilate.short_effect_description: Turns the bearer's normal moves into flying moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

parental-bond.name: parental-bond
parental-bond.effect_description: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.
parental-bond.short_effect_description: Lets the bearer hit twice with damaging moves.  The second hit has half power.

dark-aura.name: dark-aura
dark-aura.description: Powers up each Pokémon’s Dark-type moves.
dark-aura.effect_description: Strengthens dark moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
dark-aura.short_effect_description: Strengthens dark moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

fairy-aura.name: fairy-aura
fairy-aura.description: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.
fairy-aura.effect_description: Strengthens fairy moves for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.
fairy-aura.short_effect_description: Strengthens fairy moves to 1.33× their power for all friendly and opposing Pokémon.

aura-break.name: aura-break
aura-break.description: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed.
aura-break.effect_description: While this Pokémon is on the field, dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power, rather than strengthening them.
aura-break.short_effect_description: Makes dark aura and fairy aura weaken moves of their respective types.

primordial-sea.name: primordial-sea
primordial-sea.description: Affects weather and nullifies any Fire-type attacks.
primordial-sea.effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes heavy rain.  Heavy rain has all the properties of rain dance and also causes damaging Fire moves to fail.  Heavy rain ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of delta stream and desolate land.  air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effects of heavy rain, including allowing Fire moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
primordial-sea.short_effect_description: Creates heavy rain, which has all the properties of Rain Dance, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Fire moves to fail.

desolate-land.name: desolate-land
desolate-land.description: Affects weather and nullifies any Water-type attacks.
desolate-land.effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes extremely harsh sunlight.  Extremely harsh sunlight has all the properties of sunny day and also causes damaging Water moves to fail.  Extremely harsh sunlight ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of delta stream and primordial sea.  air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effects of extremely harsh sunlight, including allowing Water moves to work, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
desolate-land.short_effect_description: Creates extremely harsh sunlight, which has all the properties of Sunny Day, cannot be replaced, and causes damaging Water moves to fail.

delta-stream.name: delta-stream
delta-stream.description: Affects weather and eliminates all of the Flying type’s weaknesses.
delta-stream.effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle or gains this ability, the weather becomes a mysterious air current.  A mysterious air current causes moves to not be super effective against Flying; they do neutral damage instead.  anticipation and stealth rock are not affected.  The mysterious air current ends when this Pokémon leaves battle or loses this ability, or when this ability is nullified.  The weather cannot otherwise be changed except by the effects of desolate land and primordial sea.  air lock and cloud nine will prevent the effect of a mysterious air current, but will not allow the weather to be changed.
delta-stream.short_effect_description: Creates a mysterious air current, which cannot be replaced and causes moves to never be super effective against Flying Pokémon.

stamina.name: stamina
stamina.description: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
stamina.effect_description: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.
stamina.short_effect_description: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by one stage when it takes damage from a move.

wimp-out.name: wimp-out
wimp-out.description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
wimp-out.effect_description: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
wimp-out.short_effect_description: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

emergency-exit.name: emergency-exit
emergency-exit.description: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
emergency-exit.effect_description: After this Pokémon is hit by a move, if that move caused this Pokémon's HP to drop below half, it switches out.
emergency-exit.short_effect_description: This Pokémon automatically switches out when its HP drops below half.

water-compaction.name: water-compaction
water-compaction.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.
water-compaction.effect_description: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
water-compaction.short_effect_description: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

merciless.name: merciless
merciless.description: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
merciless.effect_description: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.
merciless.short_effect_description: This Pokémon's moves critical hit against poisoned targets.

shields-down.name: shields-down
shields-down.description: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.
shields-down.effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle and at the end of each turn, if its HP is 50% or above, it changes into Meteor Form; otherwise, it changes into Core Form.  In Meteor Form, it cannot be given a major status ailment (though existing ones are not cured), cannot become drowsy from yawn, and cannot use rest (which will simply fail).  This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Minior.
shields-down.short_effect_description: Transforms this Minior between Core Form and Meteor Form.  Prevents major status ailments and drowsiness while in Meteor Form.

stakeout.name: stakeout
stakeout.description: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.
stakeout.effect_description: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
stakeout.short_effect_description: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

water-bubble.name: water-bubble
water-bubble.description: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
water-bubble.effect_description: When this Pokémon is hit by a Fire move, the damage is halved.  When this Pokémon uses a Water move, the power is doubled. This Pokémon cannot be burned, and if it becomes burned, the burn is immediately cured.
water-bubble.short_effect_description: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.

steelworker.name: steelworker
steelworker.effect_description: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.
steelworker.short_effect_description: This Pokémon's Steel moves have 1.5× power.

berserk.name: berserk
berserk.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a  hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
berserk.effect_description: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move that causes its HP to drop below 50%, its Special Attack rises by one stage.
berserk.short_effect_description: Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.

slush-rush.name: slush-rush
slush-rush.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.
slush-rush.effect_description: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.
slush-rush.short_effect_description: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.

long-reach.name: long-reach
long-reach.description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.
long-reach.effect_description: A move used by this Pokémon will not make contact.
long-reach.short_effect_description: This Pokémon's moves do not make contact.

liquid-voice.name: liquid-voice
liquid-voice.description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
liquid-voice.effect_description: When this Pokémon uses a move that is sound-based, that move's type is Water.

triage.name: triage
triage.description: Gives priority to a healing move.
triage.effect_description: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
triage.short_effect_description: This Pokémon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

galvanize.name: galvanize
galvanize.description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
galvanize.effect_description: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.
galvanize.short_effect_description: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.

surge-surfer.name: surge-surfer
surge-surfer.description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on Electric Terrain.
surge-surfer.effect_description: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.
surge-surfer.short_effect_description: Doubles this Pokémon's Speed on Electric Terrain.

schooling.name: schooling
schooling.description: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.
schooling.effect_description: If this Pokémon is a wishiwashi and level 20 or above, then when it enters battle and at the start of each turn, it becomes Schooling Form if its HP is 25% or higher and Solo Form otherwise.  This ability cannot be replaced, copied, or nullified.
schooling.short_effect_description: Wishiwashi becomes Schooling Form when its HP is 25% or higher.

disguise.name: disguise
disguise.description: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
disguise.effect_description: If this Pokémon is in its Disguised Form and takes damage from a move, it switches to its Busted Form and the damage is prevented.  Other effects are not prevented.  This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Mimikyu.
disguise.short_effect_description: Prevents the first instance of battle damage.

battle-bond.name: battle-bond
battle-bond.description: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.
battle-bond.effect_description: Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.  This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Greninja.
battle-bond.short_effect_description: Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.

power-construct.name: power-construct
power-construct.description: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.
power-construct.effect_description: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.  This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Zygarde.
power-construct.short_effect_description: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.

corrosion.name: corrosion
corrosion.description: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
corrosion.effect_description: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
corrosion.short_effect_description: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.

comatose.name: comatose
comatose.description: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
comatose.effect_description: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.  It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by yawn; it can use sleep talk; and so on.
comatose.short_effect_description: This Pokémon always  acts as though it were Asleep.

queenly-majesty.name: queenly-majesty
queenly-majesty.description: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
queenly-majesty.effect_description: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
queenly-majesty.short_effect_description: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

innards-out.name: innards-out
innards-out.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
innards-out.effect_description: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.
innards-out.short_effect_description: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

dancer.name: dancer
dancer.description: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
dancer.effect_description: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
dancer.short_effect_description: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

battery.name: battery
battery.description: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.
battery.effect_description: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.
battery.short_effect_description: Ally Pokémon's moves have their power increased to 1.3×.

fluffy.name: fluffy
fluffy.description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
fluffy.effect_description: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
fluffy.short_effect_description: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.

dazzling.name: dazzling
dazzling.description: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.
dazzling.effect_description: When an opposing Pokémon attempts to use a move that targets this Pokémon or an ally, and that move has priority, it will fail.
dazzling.short_effect_description: Opposing Pokémon cannot use priority attacks.

soul-heart.name: soul-heart
soul-heart.description: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.
soul-heart.effect_description: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.
soul-heart.short_effect_description: This Pokémon's Special Attack rises by one stage every time any Pokémon faints.

tangling-hair.name: tangling-hair
tangling-hair.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
tangling-hair.effect_description: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.
tangling-hair.short_effect_description: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

receiver.name: receiver
receiver.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
receiver.effect_description: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
receiver.short_effect_description: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

power-of-alchemy.name: power-of-alchemy
power-of-alchemy.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
power-of-alchemy.effect_description: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.
power-of-alchemy.short_effect_description: When an ally faints, this Pokémon gains its Ability.

beast-boost.name: beast-boost
beast-boost.description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
beast-boost.effect_description: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
beast-boost.short_effect_description: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.

rks-system.name: rks-system
rks-system.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.
rks-system.effect_description: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.  This ability cannot be copied, replaced, or nullified.  This ability only takes effect for Silvally.
rks-system.short_effect_description: Changes this Pokémon's type to match its held Memory.

electric-surge.name: electric-surge
electric-surge.description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
electric-surge.effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to electric terrain.
electric-surge.short_effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Electric Terrain.

psychic-surge.name: psychic-surge
psychic-surge.description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
psychic-surge.effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to psychic terrain.
psychic-surge.short_effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain.

misty-surge.name: misty-surge
misty-surge.description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
misty-surge.effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to misty terrain.
misty-surge.short_effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Misty Terrain.

grassy-surge.name: grassy-surge
grassy-surge.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
grassy-surge.effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to grassy terrain.
grassy-surge.short_effect_description: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to Grassy Terrain.

full-metal-body.name: full-metal-body
full-metal-body.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.
full-metal-body.effect_description: This Pokémon's stats cannot be lowered by other Pokémon's moves or abilities.  This effect only applies to normal stat modifications and not more exotic effects such as topsy turvy or power swap.  This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.
full-metal-body.short_effect_description: Other Pokémon cannot lower this Pokémon's stats.

shadow-shield.name: shadow-shield
shadow-shield.description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
shadow-shield.effect_description: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage (not fixed damage!) from moves is halved.  This ability cannot be nullified.
shadow-shield.short_effect_description: When this Pokémon has full HP, regular damage from moves is halved.

prism-armor.name: prism-armor
prism-armor.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
prism-armor.effect_description: Super-effective damage this Pokémon takes is reduced to 0.75×.  This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.

neuroforce.name: neuroforce
neuroforce.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.

intrepid-sword.name: intrepid-sword
intrepid-sword.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dauntless-shield.name: dauntless-shield
dauntless-shield.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

libero.name: libero
libero.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

ball-fetch.name: ball-fetch
ball-fetch.description: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

cotton-down.name: cotton-down
cotton-down.description: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.

propeller-tail.name: propeller-tail
propeller-tail.description: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

mirror-armor.name: mirror-armor
mirror-armor.description: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

gulp-missile.name: gulp-missile
gulp-missile.description: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

stalwart.name: stalwart
stalwart.description: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

steam-engine.name: steam-engine
steam-engine.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

punk-rock.name: punk-rock
punk-rock.description: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

sand-spit.name: sand-spit
sand-spit.description: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

ice-scales.name: ice-scales
ice-scales.description: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

ripen.name: ripen
ripen.description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

ice-face.name: ice-face
ice-face.description: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it hails.

power-spot.name: power-spot
power-spot.description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

mimicry.name: mimicry
mimicry.description: Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.

screen-cleaner.name: screen-cleaner
screen-cleaner.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

steely-spirit.name: steely-spirit
steely-spirit.description: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.

perish-body.name: perish-body
perish-body.description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

wandering-spirit.name: wandering-spirit
wandering-spirit.description: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

gorilla-tactics.name: gorilla-tactics
gorilla-tactics.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

neutralizing-gas.name: neutralizing-gas
neutralizing-gas.description: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

pastel-veil.name: pastel-veil
pastel-veil.description: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.

hunger-switch.name: hunger-switch
hunger-switch.description: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn.

quick-draw.name: quick-draw
quick-draw.description: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

unseen-fist.name: unseen-fist
unseen-fist.description: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

curious-medicine.name: curious-medicine
curious-medicine.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

chilling-neigh.name: chilling-neigh
chilling-neigh.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

grim-neigh.name: grim-neigh
grim-neigh.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

as-one.name: as-one
as-one.description: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.
